item.title: Slides
item.description: Userful tools and concepts URL: https://gitpitch.com/epogrebnyak/tools @title[Productivity:] WSL, command line, linux remote computing, ssh, editors: vim -> IDEs AWS S3 git, workflow, messages Travis CI data, DAG, storage doi, bibliography even file naming PDF markdown, pandoc, PDF todos, try, doing, done docs - coding style, sphinx Twitter @title[Coding:] OOP vs FP databases: ORM, SQL O(n) notation TDD library popularity A summary of: https://github.com/epogrebnyak/notes-linux-cli for WSL https://github.
